name: The Detective Story
hook: Frame problems as mysteries to solve
description: Leads audiences through a structured investigation that builds evidence for your proposed solution, naturally dismissing counter-arguments as false leads.

name: The Crossroads
hook: Contrast present problems with future visions
description: Contrasts vivid depictions of current problems with compelling visions of transformed futures, building emotional investment by helping audiences visualize potential outcomes.

name: The Rational Advocate
hook: Build cases through logic and evidence
description: Prioritizes logical reasoning and empirical evidence, systematically building cases through statistics, expert testimony, and cost-benefit analysis.

name: The Call to Conscience
description: Appeals to moral principles and shared values, transforming policy debates into ethical imperatives by connecting reforms to fundamental questions of right and wrong.

name: The Case History
hook: Make issues real through personal narratives
description: Uses detailed personal narratives and character studies to help audiences understand abstract issues through the experiences of specific, relatable individuals.

name: The Emotional Escalator
hook: Build from attention to committed action
description: Guides audiences through intensifying psychological states, systematically building from initial attention to committed action through carefully calibrated emotional transitions.
